title: Flexxbotics continues expansion, opening office at Newlab in Detroit
description:
With Newlab, Flexxbotics, which digitalizes industrial automation, is establishing a presence in the heart of U.S. manufacturing.

The post Flexxbotics continues expansion, opening office at Newlab in Detroit appeared first on The Robot Report.
